title: Rise in Pride Roz: The R.I.P. Series Book 3
description: "Darkness may be in control, but love is the Light." Rise in Pride Roz, the third book of The R.I.P. Series, brings a climactic finish to the epic love story of Roz and Jimmy. She's an orphaned teenager. He's a decades-old ghost. He was once her protector; Now he's turned to the Dark. However, Roz will stop at nothing to save those she loves. With the help of her powerful foster mom Bonnie and unlikely ally Parker Evans, she just might achieve the impossible. But at what cost?
author: Kris Johnston
